QuestData.Title: Sacred Scroll
QuestData.Description: The unfamiliar markings on this parchment have an elegance about them that Yoggtord and his gang don't seem capable of.$b$bYou suspect that, like everything else these Hozu possess, this is stolen merchandise.$b$bPerhaps the original owner of the scroll is still nearby...
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Illegible Scroll to Lorewalker Cho.
